tossup_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three compounds that have more ionic character than lithium chloride: 1) Lithium fluoride; 2) Rubidium fluoride; 3) Lithium bromide.
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following is the name for the type of isomerism, which is a subset of stereoisomerism, describing compounds that interconvert by rotation of single bonds?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Constitutional isomerism
X) Cis-trans isomerism
Y) Enantiomerism
Z) Conformational isomerism
